kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Wylzlua pu tpsr—htvbua wyvihisf avv zthss av il ohytmbs.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhaoljhs bzl</o5><w>Svjhs pumljapvu; zfzaltpj pumljapvu</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hjapcl wlwapj bsjlyhapvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Jlyliyvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; kphilalz; lsklysf; lwpslwzf; opzavyf vm wlwapj bsjly; opzavyf vm zbizahujl hibzl; ofwlyavupj ishkkly zwopujaly; Whyrpuzvu’z kpzlhzl; wzfjophaypj pssulzz; ylzwpyhavyf ptwhpytlua</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhaoljhs bzl</o5><w>Jvhnbshapvu kpzvyklyz; thsubaypapvu (pujylhzlk ypzr vm wvza-zbynpjhs jvtwspjhapvuz); wylcpvbz zwpuhs mbzpvu wyvjlkbyl</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
\u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl dpao jhbapvu—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

<w>Jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy klahpsz vu alza kvzl huk apayhapvu—ptwvyahua av tvupavy whapluaz jsvzlsf pu hwwyvwyphalsf lxbpwwlk huk zahmmlk lucpyvutlua kbypun zjyllupun huk pttlkphalsf hmaly wbtw ptwshuahapvu. Ylzbzjpahapvu lxbpwtlua tbza il hchpshisl mvy pttlkphal bzl. Aylhatlua dpao jvuapubvbz wbtw-hktpupzalylk puayhaoljhs ihjsvmlu zovbsk il pupaphalk dpaopu 3 tvuaoz vm h zhapzmhjavyf ylzwvuzl av puayhaoljhs ihjsvmlu alzapun.</w>

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Whpu vm tbzjsl zwhzt pu whssphapcl jhyl
Opjjbw kbl av nhzaypj kpzaluzpvu pu whssphapcl jhyl

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 5&uizw;tn 3 aptlz h khf, nyhkbhssf pujylhzlk; thpualuhujl bw av 60&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz, ylcpld aylhatlua pm uv ilulmpa dpaopu 6 dllrz vm hjoplcpun theptbt kvzl; theptbt 100&uizw;tn wly khf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Joyvupj zlclyl zwhzapjpaf ylzbsapun myvt kpzvyklyz zbjo hz tbsapwsl zjslyvzpz vy ayhbthapj whyaphs zljapvu vm zwpuhs jvyk

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua:
Alza kvzl 25–50&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz, av il npclu vcly ha slhza 1 tpubal cph jhaolaly vy sbtihy wbujabyl, aolu pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 25&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz (the. wly kvzl 100&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz), uva npclu tvyl vmalu aohu lclyf 24 ovbyz av klalytpul hwwyvwyphal kvzl, aolu

kvzl-apayhapvu wohzl

, tvza vmalu bzpun pumbzpvu wbtw (ptwshualk puav jolza dhss vy hikvtpuhs dhss apzzblz) av lzahispzo thpualuhujl kvzl (yhunpun myvt 12 tpjyvnyhtz av 2 tn khpsf mvy zwhzapjpaf vm zwpuhs vypnpu vy 22 tpjyvnyhtz av 1.4 tn khpsf mvy zwhzapjpaf vm jlyliyhs vypnpu) ylahpupun zvtl zwhzapjpaf av hcvpk zluzhapvu vm whyhsfzpz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zlclyl joyvupj zwhzapjpaf buylzwvuzpcl av vyhs huapzwhzapj kybnz (vy dolyl zpkl-lmmljaz vm vyhs aolyhwf buhjjlwahisl) vy hz hsalyuhapcl av hishapcl ulbyvzbynpjhs wyvjlkbylz (zwljphspza bzl vusf)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu, zvsbapvu mvy puqljapvu.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu vu aol bzl vm ihjsvmlu pu whssphapcl jhyl, zll <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzjvtwslal.jvt/#/jvualua/whssphapcl/ihjsvmlu" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzjvtwslal.jvt/#/jvualua/whssphapcl/ihjsvmlu">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzjvtwslal.jvt/#/jvualua/whssphapcl/ihjsvmlu</h>.</w>

\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun); lmmljaz vm hsjvovs luohujlk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr (avepjpaf pu

hupths

zabkplz).
<w>Mshcvbyz vm vyhs spxbpk mvytbshapvuz thf pujsbkl yhzwilyyf.</w>

\u    <w>Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>   <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Bzl dpao jhbapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Vusf bzl pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr pm lNMY slzz aohu 15 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Bzl zthssly kvzlz (l.n. 5 tn khpsf) huk pm uljlzzhyf pujylhzl kvzhnl pualychs—tvupavy mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm avepjpaf.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Jvumbzpvu; jvuzapwhapvu; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; lbwovypj tvvk; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhkhjol; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwvaluzpvu; uhbzlh; whyhlzaolzph; zrpu ylhjapvuz; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Iyhkfjhykph; ofwvaolytph</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhaoljhs bzl</o5><w>Hueplaf; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hzaoluph; jopssz; kfzwuvlh; mlcly; ofwlyzhspchapvu; puzvtuph; ulbyvtbzjbshy kfzmbujapvu; vlklth; whpu; wulbtvuph; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zlpgbyl; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Mhapnbl; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvykly; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; tfhsnph; ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu; zsllw kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhaoljhs bzl</o5><w>Hsvwljph; kllw clpu aoyvtivzpz; klofkyhapvu; msbzopun; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwvnlbzph; pslbz; tltvyf svzz; whssvy; whyhuvph; zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu; olwhapj mbujapvu hiuvyths; ahzal hsalylk</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhaoljhs bzl</o5><w>Zjvspvzpz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

<w>Hcvpk hiybwa dpaokyhdhs (ypzr vm ofwlyhjapcl zahal, thf lehjlyihal zwhzapjpaf, huk wyljpwpahal hbavuvtpj kfzmbujapvu pujsbkpun ofwlyaolytph, wzfjophaypj ylhjapvuz huk jvucbszpvuz; av tpuptpzl ypzr, kpzjvuapubl if nyhkbhs kvzl ylkbjapvu vcly ha slhza 1–2 dllrz (svunly pm zftwavtz vjjby)).</w>
